timeline.bodyText: is it necessary to store valueToString? we could generate valueToString in toString method

timeline.bodyText: If path = null, can we throw a self-defined exception instead of NullPointer exception?
timeline.author: Genius-pig

replies.bodyText: according to the anltr gramma (TIME | TIMESTAMP | suffixPath | prefixPath).  path == null is impossible.
replies.author: fanhualta
